document_data.name: Drowning Flagon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Drowning Flagon''' was an inn in [[Marsember]], [[Cormyr]] owned by [[Polinar Kirin]] and was originally established by a noble.

Structure.Interior: This hall had three floors, the bottom two of which were used for dancing and the top floor for sleeping. It had two entrances: one for locals and one for visitors. It was used as a meeting place for gambling or for local organizations, but become expensive to stay in, attracting wealthier visitors to the city. Ever since a devastating fire, the kitchens were in their own separate building.

document_data.Prices: Rooms for 7 gp per night for each person
